title: Jakarta Book Festival 2025 Officially Opens
description: Thousands of visitors filled Balai Kartini to attend the Jakarta Book Festival 2025, featuring more than 200 local and international publishers.

title: Young Indonesian Author Wins ASEAN Literature Award
description: The debut novel 'Sky Behind Words' by Dinda Rahma won the ASEAN Literature Award for its powerful narrative and deep social themes.

title: National Publisher Launches e-Book Platform in Regional Languages
description: This new initiative aims to preserve local languages by offering digital books in Sundanese, Javanese, and Buginese.

title: Teen Reading Interest in Indonesia Surges Throughout 2025
description: A recent survey shows a 35% increase in young adult fiction book sales, driven by the rise of local fantasy novels and film adaptations.

title: National Digital Library Adds 50,000 New Titles
description: The latest collection includes history books, academic research, and classic literature now freely accessible to the public.
